GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.10.134
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_notsent_lowat.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit fd6f1284e380c377932186042ff0b5c987fb2b92, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit c9bee3b7fdecb0c1d070c7b54113b3bdfb9a3d36. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_notsent_lowat.
